text:
@parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Did you drive the Ferrari over, Brad? Or take the yacht? 

That mask is quite a campaign statement. We have to wear them and the country now owes new trillions of dollars because of Trump's utter incompetence. #Covid19
